info.author: N. Cantale
info.description:
Simple python module allowing the use of sextractor on image files or numpy arrays.

Usage exemple:

import pysex
cat = pysex.run('myimage.fits', params=['X_IMAGE', 'Y_IMAGE', 'FLUX_APER'], 
                conf_args={'PHOT_APERTURES':5})
print cat['FLUX_APER']
info.name: pysex
info.summary: Python wrapper around the sextractor software
info.html_description:
Simple python module allowing the use of sextractor on image files or numpy arrays.

Usage exemple:

import pysex
cat = pysex.run('myimage.fits', params=['X_IMAGE', 'Y_IMAGE', 'FLUX_APER'],
conf_args={'PHOT_APERTURES':5})
print cat['FLUX_APER']
